About.title: Dr / Hamouda Mohammed
About.subtitle: Mechanical Engineer
About.description: Experienced Associate Professor and dean of Faculty of Technological Industry and Energy, Tiabah Technological University. I have experience in Materials Science, Medical Devices, Biomaterials, Research, and Design. Strong education professional with a Fulbright Visiting Scholar focused in Bioengineering and Biomedical Engineering from Texas A&M University and MIT. Awarded SVU encourage award 2017 in engineering and Egyptian state Encourage award for engineering science for the year 2020.
About.position: Associate Professor & Dean of Faculty of Technological Industry and Energy
About.positionDescription: With a strong academic foundation and years of practical experience, I strive to lead impactful research and deliver high-quality education to future engineers.
About.finalDescription: I bring a deep commitment to advancing technological education and research, with a focus on fostering innovation, sustainability, and collaboration across disciplines. My leadership roles have allowed me to build impactful programs and inspire the next generation of engineers.

AcademicJourney.title: Academic Journey
AcademicJourney.description: Explore the journey of academic excellence through a showcase of esteemed universities, institutes, and conferences. This portfolio reflects a legacy of contributions to mechanical engineering and doctoral research.

mit.title: Massachusetts Institute of Technology
mit.description: Fulbright scholar 2019-2020 Fulbright Egyptian Scholar Program – Post-doctoral Research Grants Department of Mechanical Engineering , Online Training on Advanced Laboratory Safety, research ethics, Biosafety, Shop and Chemical Safety, etc.

naqaae.title: NAQAAE
naqaae.description: 2023-till now External Reviewer for Faculties and Institutes of Higher Education .

ksu.title: King Saud University
ksu.description:
2009–2012: Training in Metrology Labs using high-tech accuracy instruments at KSU. Involved in teaching Metrology Laboratory, Design of Manufacturing Systems tutorial, Welding Laboratory, Casting Laboratory, and Sheet Metal Laboratory.

17–18 January 2010: Certification from Taylor Hobson Precision Center, England — Training on measuring surface finish and contour using Form Talysurf i120 3D measuring instrument with advanced software.

20–24 January 2010: Certification from Taylor Hobson Precision Center, England — Training on measuring surface finish using the CCI 6000 measuring instrument with advanced software and NANO accuracy.

10 March 2010: Certification from Spectrum Metrology Ltd Precision Center, England — Training on measuring angle, alignment, flatness, parallelism, squareness, and straightness using Micro Alignment Telescope System, Talyvel 5, Electro-Optics Analysis Software, and CCD System.

1–4 March 2010: Attended the First Scientific Students Conference of the Higher Education Ministry.

11 May 2010: Participated in the workshop "Role of Manufacturing Technology to Support the Industry of Spare Parts."

May 2010: Certification for attending the Six Sigma Green Belt course at King Saud University.

astr.title: Academy of Scientific and Technological Research
astr.description: Egyptian state encouragement award for engineering science 2020. ,Excellence prize for project title "Fabrication of 3D printer using reverse engineering" in 4th international Cairo innovation forum.

gifted.title: Gifted and Talented Care Center
gifted.description: From 2023-till now Director of center of gifted and talented students Thebes Technological University, Luxor, Egypt

assiut.title: Assiut University
assiut.description: 2002-2007 B.Sc Mechanical Engineering department, Faculty of Engineering (Very good grade with 79.89 %). Assiut university, Assiut, Egypt. 2007 Certificate for superior student in bachelor student's symposium. Assuit University, Egypt. December 2006 Participate with a great affair in the 4th international conference for mechanical engineering and advanced technology for industrial production.

jeonbuk.title: Jeonbuk National University
jeonbuk.description: March 2014- August 2016 PhD Division of Mechanical Engineering, Department of Biosystem Engineering, Colleges of Engineering, (with GPA 4.0 out 4.0) (Supervisor Prof. Cheol Sang Kim).

texas.title: Texas A&M University
texas.description: Principal candidate for the 2017 Fulbright Egyptian Junior Faculty Development Program and Summer 2017 Training modules on Advanced Laboratory Safety, research ethics, Biosafety Level 1 Training, Safety for Office & General Work Areas, Research Lab, Shop and Chemical Safety, TEES Hazardous Waste Disposal, and TEES Shop & Tool Safety Course..

fulbright.title: FULBRIGHT Egypt
fulbright.description: Principal candidate for the 2017 Fulbright Egyptian Junior Faculty Development Program,Principal candidate for the 2019/2020 Fulbright Egyptian scholar program – post-doctoral research grants (10 months).
